metadata.title: CVE-2018-8035 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: This vulnerability relates to the user's browser processing of DUCC webpageinput data.The javascript comprising Apache UIMA DUCC (<= 2.2.2) which runsin the user's browser does not sufficiently filter user supplied inputs,which may result in unintended execution of user supplied javascript code.

criterions.comment: uimaj package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
